reference: This data is used in the Regression Discontinuity chapter of The Effect.
description:
Description
The gov_transfers data contains data from Manacorda, Miguel, and Vigorito (2011) on government transfer program that was administered based on an income cutoff. Data is pre-limited to households that were just around the income cutoff.
title: Data from "Government Transfers and Political Support"

parameters.Education: Household average years of education among those 16+
parameters.Income_Centered: Income measure, centered around program cutoff (negative value = eligible)
parameters.Support: Measure of support for the government

format: A data frame with 1948 rows and 5 variables
